short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and restore all your browser tabs and windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Session Saver – Effortless Browser Session Management
Never lose your browsing progress again with Session Saver, the ultimate Chrome extension for managing your browser sessions seamlessly. Whether you're juggling multiple projects, conducting research, or simply want to keep your browsing organized, Session Saver ensures your windows and tabs are always at your fingertips.

Key Features:
Automatic Session Saving:
- Scheduled Backups: Automatically save your open windows and tabs at customizable intervals (default every 10 minutes).
- Reliable Recovery: Ensure your browsing sessions are consistently backed up without manual intervention.

Manual Session Saving:
- One-Click Save: Instantly save your current session anytime with a single click from the extension's interface.
- Flexible Control: Combine automatic and manual saves to suit your workflow.

Session Limits:
- Manage Storage Efficiently: Store up to 5 recent automatic and 5 recent change-triggered sessions, preventing clutter and optimizing storage.
- Automatic Cleanup: Older sessions are automatically removed to maintain your set limit, ensuring optimal performance.

Easy Session Restoration:
- Restore All or Specific Windows: Quickly reopen all your saved windows and tabs or selectively restore individual windows as needed.
- User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design makes navigating and managing your sessions a breeze.

Customizable Notifications:
- Stay Informed: Receive notifications upon successful session saves.
- Toggle Notifications: Enable or disable notifications based on your preference for a distraction-free experience.

Personalized Settings:
- Adjustable Backup Interval: Customize how frequently your sessions are saved to match your browsing habits.
- Theme Options: Switch between light and dark themes for a comfortable visual experience tailored to your environment and personal preference.

Privacy-Focused:
- Local Storage: All your session data is securely stored locally in your browser, ensuring your information remains private without relying on external servers.
- Secure and Private: Your browsing sessions are kept confidential, giving you peace of mind.

Why Choose Session Saver?
- Boost Productivity: Save time by effortlessly managing and restoring your browsing sessions, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.
- Prevent Data Loss: Avoid the frustration of lost tabs and windows due to accidental closures or browser crashes.
- Enhanced Organization: Keep your browsing organized by categorizing sessions based on automatic backups and manual changes.
- Seamless Integration: Designed to work flawlessly with Chrome, ensuring a smooth and efficient user experience.
- Aesthetic Flexibility: Customize the extension's appearance to match your mood or lighting conditions with light and dark themes.

How to Get Started:
- Install Session Saver: Add the extension to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
- Configure Settings: Set your preferred automatic backup interval, choose between light and dark themes, and toggle notifications as desired.
- Start Browsing: Let Session Saver automatically manage your sessions or manually save them with ease.
- Restore Anytime: Access your saved sessions from the extension's interface and restore your browsing environment in just a few clicks.
- Session Saver – This is your reliable solution for preserving your browsing workflow. Install now and take control of your browser sessions effortlessly!
